objects.text:
• Breathable Mesh Material
• Non-Slip Outsole
• Comfortable Fit
• Stylish Modern Design

product_details.name: FRSHANIAH Men Athletic Shoes Breathable Running Shoes Non-Slip Fashion Sneakers
product_details.description: Slip on design easy to wear, fashion colour with everything Non-slip Wear-resistant outsole Comfortable and breathable fabric Occasion: casual, walking, running,driving , training, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, workout and so on. Multi-color choose: Black, Brown, Dark Grey, Green Yellow, Blue, Orange, Pink, Purple, Rose Red Sole material - Thermoplastic Polyurethane ** Outer material - Mesh ** Closure type - Pull-On ** Water resistance level - Not Water Resistant **

banner_details:
This dynamic sneaker banner features a futuristic, sporty theme designed to spotlight an athletic shoe product. The header sections, labeled `heading_1` and `heading_2`, use a bold tech-styled typeface in white, placed in the top-left corner. Below them, the subheading `subheading` adds product flavor in a soft lavender tint. A list of key features (`description`) is presented with bullet points, ensuring clarity and readability. A large product image (`product_image`) sits diagonally aligned, creating visual movement. The pricing (`price`) stands out in bold, followed by a high-contrast call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`). A dual-gradient background with geometric patterns and dots gives it depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Plum: `#2D0845`
- Electric Purple: `#6B2EB3`
- Bright Violet: `#B388FF`
- Soft Lavender: `#E0E0FF`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a dynamic and eye-catching color palette centered around a dominant **vibrant purple** (#5C2D91), which emits energy and modern style. This striking hue is used throughout the mesh upper and molded sole structure, creating a cohesive and bold look. Accents of **bright white** (#FFFFFF) in the text and parts of the sole provide strong contrast and help highlight branding and design details. The tread integrates a **cool medium gray** (#C0C0C0), adding depth and structure. The blending of purple and white creates visual synergy, emphasizing performance and trendiness—ideal for a bold, sporty advertisement banner.
